title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately triggers package view filter
description:
When removing a working set, the package view is immediately filtered without confirmation, which I believe is incorrect behavior. Furthermore, pressing cancel should cancel the removal of the working set.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Remove the working set.

Observed Behavior:
At the moment of deletion, the package view in the background is filtered without any prompt or confirmation.

Expected Behavior:
Refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating it. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel any changes made to the working sets, including the removal.
